title: Caribbean coconut rice with beans
ingredients: ['1 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '1 tbsp chopped fresh thyme or 1 tsp dried', '200g long-grain rice', '400ml can coconut milk', '100ml vegetable stock', '420g can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'fresh thyme leaves to garnish']
